import React, { useContext } from 'react' import './ProductDisplay.css' import star_icon from "../Assets/star_icon.png" import star_dull_icon from "../Assets/star_dull_icon.png" export const ProductDisplay = (props) => { const {product} = props; const {addToCart} = useContext(ShopContext); return (

${product.new_price}
